# Rethinking Intelligence

> A site dedicated to promoting understanding of artificial intelligence, written by Robert Todd — a learning-technology pioneer based in San Francisco, CA.

The site helps people understand and collaborate with machine intelligence. It covers AI's impact on work, learning, society, and how to think critically about the technology shaping our world.

## Pages

- [About](https://rethinkingintelligence.ai/about/): About this site and its mission.
- [Understanding AI (Resources)](https://rethinkingintelligence.ai/resources/): Curated resources to build understanding of machine and human intelligence.
- [Working with AI](https://rethinkingintelligence.ai/working/): Links to AI tools and results of experiments working with LLMs.
- [Teaching about AI](https://rethinkingintelligence.ai/teaching/): Information about talks and teaching on living and working with machine intelligence.
- [Experiments](https://rethinkingintelligence.ai/experiments/): Hands-on experiments with AI tools and models.

## Posts

- [Will AI Augment or Replace Human Labor?](https://rethinkingintelligence.ai/blog/2025/03/05/AI-impact-on-labor-demand/): History shows productivity gains from automation haven't been shared with workers. AI will likely accelerate that trend.
- [Why Write? Skills in the Age of AI](https://rethinkingintelligence.ai/blog/2025/03/05/why-write/): Now that AI writes better than most humans, the real value of writing may be less about the words and more about discovering what you actually think.
- [Learning Is Not What You Think — Unpacking Humanity's Superpower](https://rethinkingintelligence.ai/blog/2025/03/15/learning-is-more/): Learning is a multilayered biological, cognitive, and cultural process — and AI is helping us see what makes it uniquely human.
- [The Profit-Value Disconnect](https://rethinkingintelligence.ai/blog/2025/03/31/The-Profit-Value-Disconnect/): The gap between profit and genuine human value creation is already wide. AI optimizing for financial returns could make it irreversible.
- [How AI Impacts Teams](https://rethinkingintelligence.ai/blog/2025/04/02/ai-impact-on-teams-mollick/): Research with 700+ professionals at Procter & Gamble shows AI teammates improve performance and the experience of working together.
- [The Escalating Cost of Carelessness](https://rethinkingintelligence.ai/blog/2025/04/22/The-Escalating-Cost-of-Carelessness/): A review of Sarah Wynn-Williams' account of Facebook — a warning that careless leadership amplified by algorithms causes enormous damage, and AI will make that worse.
